title: Sign up for Paperless Billing
description: A customer wants to stop receiving paper bills and switch to paperless e-bills.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's email address for e-bill delivery.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the correct email address is on file.

tasks.description: Update the billing preference on the customer's account to 'Paperless'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the account setting.
